results.title: A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the 1st Infrantry Division.
results.short_title: A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the 1st Infrantry Division.
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent. (text: CR S3374-3375)
results.summary: Commemorates the 100th anniversary of the 1st Infantry Division on June 8, 2017.  Commends such division for continuing to exemplify its motto, "No Mission Too Difficult. No Sacrifice Too Great. Duty First!" Honors the memory of the more than 13,000 soldiers of such division who lost their lives in battle.
results.summary_short: Commemorates the 100th anniversary of the 1st Infantry Division on June 8, 2017.  Commends such division for continuing to exemplify its motto, "No Mission Too Difficult. No Sacrifice Too Great. Duty First!" Honors the memory of the more than 13,000 soldiers of such division who lost their lives in battle.

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent. (text: CR S3374-3375)
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent. (consideration: CR S3373-3375)
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Armed Services. (text as introduced in Senate: CR S2369)
